Package com.blukii.sdk.common

blukii library package for common enums and helper classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlukiiController
    Main controller of blukii SDK BlukiiController controls the instantiation of all package controllers that can only be loaded by BlukiiController.
    FeatureValidator
    Helper class to validate application and mobile device features.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlukiiSubType
    Enum BlukiiSubType represents the subtypes a blukii can have
    BlukiiType
    Enum BlukiiType represents the types a blukii can have
    CommonState
    Enum that represents an tri state of ON, OFF and UNDEFINED
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MissingApiKeyException
    Exception that is thrown if the API key is missing in manifest.
    UnverifiedApiKeyException
    Exception that is thrown if the API key is not correct.
    UnverifiedApiKeyException.NoInternetConnectionException
    Exception that is thrown if the API key can not be verified because of missing internet connection.

Package com.blukii.sdk.common Description

blukii library package for common enums and helper classes.

It contains the central main controller BlukiiController that gives you access to all package controllers and data managers.
